title: Can log into boards but not the client.
body: Can log into the boards but not the client. What gives? I know its the right password.

replies.body:
If you're not able to sign into the client but you _can _ log into the boards, it could be something as simple as not logging into the correct region. Make sure that you're trying to log into the NA server.

If that doesn't seem like the issue, shoot me a screenshot of the error you're seeing and I'll be able to get more context into what's going on.
Actually yeah that was it... derp... thanks for your help.
